alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Granville; Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 7:28PM EDT until May 16 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Vance County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Warren County in central North Carolina... East central Granville County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Franklin County in central North Carolina... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oxford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Oxford, Louisburg, Kittrell, Ingleside, Gillburg and South Henderson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
